36#include "kcm_locl.h"
37
38__RCSID("$NetBSD: log.c,v 1.2 2017/01/28 21:31:44 christos Exp $");
39
40static krb5_log_facility *logfac;
41
42void
43kcm_openlog(void)
44{
45 char **s = NULL, **p;
46 krb5_initlog(kcm_context, "kcm", &logfac);
47 s = krb5_config_get_strings(kcm_context, NULL, "kcm", "logging", NULL);
48 if(s == NULL)
49 s = krb5_config_get_strings(kcm_context, NULL, "logging", "kcm", NULL);
50 if(s){
51 for(p = s; *p; p++)
52 krb5_addlog_dest(kcm_context, logfac, *p);
53 krb5_config_free_strings(s);
54 }else
55 krb5_addlog_dest(kcm_context, logfac, DEFAULT_LOG_DEST);
56 krb5_set_warn_dest(kcm_context, logfac);
57}
58
59char*
60kcm_log_msg_va(int level, const char *fmt, va_list ap)
61{
62 char *msg;
63 krb5_vlog_msg(kcm_context, logfac, &msg, level, fmt, ap);
64 return msg;
65}
66
67char*
68kcm_log_msg(int level, const char *fmt, ...)
69{
70 va_list ap;
71 char *s;
72 va_start(ap, fmt);
73 s = kcm_log_msg_va(level, fmt, ap);
74 va_end(ap);
75 return s;
76}
77
78void
79kcm_log(int level, const char *fmt, ...)
80{
81 va_list ap;
82 char *s;
83 va_start(ap, fmt);
84 s = kcm_log_msg_va(level, fmt, ap);
85 if(s) free(s);
86 va_end(ap);
87}
88
